shellcommand_test.comment: Ensure kernel module udf is not loadable
Ensure kernel module udf is not loaded
Ensure kernel module sctp is not loadable
Ensure kernel module sctp is not loaded
Ensure 'sestatus' output Pattern Match '^Loaded policy name:\s+fortified$' (string)
Ensure 'sestatus' output Pattern Match '^Mode from config file:\s+enforcing$' (string)
Ensure 'sestatus' output Pattern Match '^Policy MLS status:\s+enabled$' (string)
Ensure 'sestatus' output Pattern Match '^Policy deny_unknown status:\s+denied$' (string)
Ensure 'sestatus' output Pattern Match '^Memory protection checking:\s+actual \(secure\)$' (string)
Ensure 'apiclient get settings.ntp.time-servers' output Pattern Not Match '^\{\}$' (string)

file_test.comment: Ensure any file(s) named .* in /var/log/journal exists and does not have permissions ----wxrwx

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure kernel module udf is not loadable
Ensure kernel module udf is not loaded
Ensure kernel module sctp is not loadable
Ensure kernel module sctp is not loaded
Ensure 'sestatus' output Pattern Match '^Loaded policy name:\s+fortified$' (string)

Ensure 'sestatus' output Pattern Match '^Policy MLS status:\s+enabled$' (string)
Ensure 'sestatus' output Pattern Match '^Policy deny_unknown status:\s+denied$' (string)
Ensure 'sestatus' output Pattern Match '^Memory protection checking:\s+actual \(secure\)$' (string)
Ensure 'apiclient get settings.ntp.time-servers' output Pattern Not Match '^\{\}$' (string)
